mapper.select: select coll_nm from colleage where coll_num !=0 order by COLL_NUM asc

select a.COLL_NUM ,a.coll_nm ,b.dept_num ,b.dept_nm , c.stu_nm_kor ,count(b.dept_num) count from colleage a , department b , student c where a.coll_num = b.coll_num and b.dept_num = c.dept_num and a.coll_num !=0 and a.coll_num is not null group by rollup(a.COLL_NUM ,(a.coll_nm ,b.dept_num ,b.dept_nm , c.stu_nm_kor) ) having a.coll_nm is null and a.coll_num is not null order by a.COLL_NUM asc
select a.DEPT_NUM, a.DEPT_NM , count(a.dept_nm) count from department a , student b where a.DEPT_NUM !=0 and a.dept_num = b.dept_num group by a.DEPT_NUM,a.DEPT_NM order by a.DEPT_NUM asc
SELECT DISTINCT(T.YEAR2) YEAR2 FROM( SELECT SUBSTR(STU_NUM,1,4) YEAR2 FROM STUDENT ) T ORDER BY T.YEAR2 ASC
SELECT COUNT(T.REG) count FROM( SELECT SUBSTR(STU_NUM,1,4) YEAR2, SUBSTR(STU_REG2,1,1) REG FROM STUDENT ) T GROUP BY T.YEAR2, T.REG ORDER BY T.YEAR2 ASC
select T.NUM, T.DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_NUM !=0 ORDER BY DEPT_NUM ASC ) T WHERE T.NUM <= 9

SELECT T.DEPT_NUM , T.STU_REG2 , COUNT(T.STU_REG2) COUNT FROM( SELECT DEPT_NUM, SUBSTR(STU_REG2,1,1) STU_REG2 FROM STUDENT ORDER BY DEPT_NUM,STU_REG2 ASC ) T WHERE T.DEPT_NUM <= 9 AND T.DEPT_NUM !=0 GROUP BY T.DEPT_NUM , T.STU_REG2 ORDER BY T.DEPT_NUM ASC
